Body:
tfr = CAMBTransferFunction.read(os.path.join(dataExtern(), 'camb',
    'camb_tfr.pkl'))
fig, ax = plt.subplots()
zp = [0.5, 1.0, 2.0]
k = np.logspace(-3, 1, 100) / u.Mpc
for z in zp:
    ax.plot(k, tfr(z, k), label='$z={0:.2f}$'.format(z))
ax.set_xscale('log')
ax.set_yscale('log')
ax.set_xlabel('$k({\\rm Mpc}^{-1})$', fontsize=22)
ax.set_ylabel('$T_{\\rm CDM}(k)/k^2 (h^{-2}{\\rm Mpc}^2)$', fontsize=22)
ax.legend(loc='upper right')
fig.savefig('camb_tfr.png')
